meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7497.

td.p: Steve Asiatico, a network engineer from McKinney, Texas
Julie Brannon, a professor of English from Jacksonville, Florida
Adam Vesterholt, an energy engineer from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,801)

tr.td: PIE-POURRI
ENDS WITH K
PICK YOUR POISON
A FALLEN CATEGORY
WHAT DAY IS IT?
THE RUSSIANS ARE COMING! THE RUSSIANS ARE COMING!
